mentionedBy.name: Okta Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Now part of Okta but available as standalone platform. Developer-centric identity platform focused on flexibility and customization. Chosen by organizations needing to embed secure authentication into custom applications. Caters to product teams, startups, and enterprises prioritizing developer experience.
